Me in 10 words

I am an IT Systems analyst and Project Manager with strong expertise in SAP CRM with international working experience acquired worldwide.

As a Senior Consultant with over 16 years of working experience, I'm focussed on the functional and Technical aspects of the projects, mainly on OTC scenarios. Certified in different SAP Technologies, including CRM, ECC and BI.

In my other life I am also a technology addict, developer, blockchain passionate and skipper that loves to play Lego with the family.
